diff --git a/tests/test_basic_api.py b/tests/test_basic_api.py
index 20a83761..4809944e 100644
--- a/tests/test_basic_api.py
+++ b/tests/test_basic_api.py
@@ -404,3 +404,26 @@ class TestFilters:
         assert 'lemma' == tokens[0][1]
         assert 'A ' == tokens[3][1]
         assert '\U000027f9' == tokens[4][1]
+
+def test_get_all_lexers_tuple_structure_no_plugins():
+    from pygments.lexers import get_all_lexers
+    lexers = list(get_all_lexers(plugins=False))
+    assert lexers, "Expected at least one built-in lexer"
+    assert all(len(t) == 4 for t in lexers[:50])
+    name, aliases, filenames, mimetypes = lexers[0]
+    assert isinstance(name, str)
+    assert isinstance(aliases, tuple)
+    assert isinstance(filenames, tuple)
+    assert isinstance(mimetypes, tuple)
+
+
+def test_get_all_lexers_plugins_flag_controls_plugin_loading(monkeypatch):
+    import pygments.lexers
+
+    def boom():
+        raise AssertionError("find_plugin_lexers must not be called when plugins=False")
+
+    monkeypatch.setattr(pygments.lexers, "find_plugin_lexers", boom)
+
+    # Should not attempt to load plugins
+    list(pygments.lexers.get_all_lexers(plugins=False))
